infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires access to the camera for taking photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires access to your photo library to select and upload photos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app requires access to the microphone for recording audio.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires access to your location when the app is in use.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app requires access to your location at all times.
